item.title: This is easy i just forget
item.dc:creator: @mopar_I mopar I
item.description:
@mopar_I wrote:

Go to the NPChandler.java (as Zaron said) and search what the npc’s already say. Replace that with what you want it to say.

Also, that is bumping and double posting. Just edit the post you already have, so you dont break the forum rules.

Read full topic
